__e: We met you, got to know you and realized you could accomplish some things... and, like a lot of us, you could use some help.
You're gifted, brilliant, and together we can do anything.
That night in the city, when you thought I was The Special and you said I was talented and important that was the first time anyone had ever really told me that.
You got a lot of gifts but hanging a "louie" isn't one of them.
- Not at all! The kid has talent.
I knew she was talented, but as far as I can tell, she captured everything.
Nathan, that would make her a very talented young lady, wouldn't it?
We could really use a bright young man like you. Especially right now, with the big push and all.
I forget what a brilliant young woman you are, how you're capable of making your own decisions.
I wonder if you realise the talents you have.
All I ever wanted was for you to prove me wrong, and show the world how brilliant you were.
How could you not want him to see how talented you are?
Instead, George supports a most fair, if less numerate man...
